1.body: You finally graduated from high school, and after a long summer, it is time to go to college. It is the start of your own life!

12.body: You pack your things and go to your dorm room. You see your dorm mates. You decide to...

121.body: As you greet your roommates, they tell you some of the rules for living together. You are happy to meet new people, and feel a little less nervous.

1211.body: You wake up in the morning refreshed and happy. Though a bit homesick, you decide to it is time to go to class.
1211.button1: You go with your new roommates
1211.button2: You see they are still sleeping, you go alone

12112.body: You end up getting lost and didn't even manage to get to class. You end up getting very very sad. (-60) (-40)

121123.body:
You meet someone pretty cool, who guides you back to school. Turns out he was the assistant of the professor whose class you missed.
Shocked at the coincidence, the person filled you in on everything in the class you missed, and told you he would explain it to the professor

1211233.title: Happy Ending
1211233.body:
Ending: You make friends with the teaching assistant, and when you got back to the dorm, you were very happy.
You felt less lonely and more comfort knowing there is someone for you.

12111.body: You decide to go with your new roommates, but they are asleep, so as you wait for them to wake up, you end up running low on time.
12111.button1: You decide to run for it with them
12111.button2: You decide to walk it with them

121112.body:
You walk with you roommates, but the professor wasn't too happy about it.
But as it was the first day, he let it go!

1211123.body: You finish class well, but the professor then has a talk with you and your roommates for an hour or so after and then you decide to explore the shops with your roommate. Turns out your roommate had a job, and you decided to apply a position there too.

12111233.title: Happy Ending
12111233.body:
Ending: Life's ok! You have gotten closer to one of your roommates and now have some mental support.
You meet new people and genuinely feel happy! You get some free food and exercise, Nice!

121111.body: You make it on class on time, panting and you take a seat.The lecture seems a bit boring and you start feeling drowsy.

1211112.body: You listen in class despite your tiredness (-20) You then decide to

12111122.body: You play alone and feel sad (-20)

121111223.body: Today was a tiring day, and you are homesick. You couldn't muster the courage to call your parents, only to find out you were not doing that well.

1211112233.title: Happy? Ending
1211112233.body:
Ending: You end up crying in the dorm, and later you heard a slight click at the door.
You close your eyes, not wanting your dormmates to find out your sadness.
You feel someone slowly stroking your head, and helping you cover the blankets.
And you slowly fall asleep!

12111121.body: You study with your dormmates (+20) (+20)You feel smarter, but your dormmates are now all busy, now you decide to ...

121111212.body: You then wander the campus, and you see people.

1211112123.body: You join the group of people, to only find they were doing something suspiscous. , you run and run!

12111121233.title: Normal Ending
12111121233.body:
Ending: You trip and hit the asphalt. Luckily there were no injuries.
Turns out, they were just doing club activities!

121111211.body: You eat alone and you decide to run, your mental health feels better, and your stamina seems better (+20) (+20)You decide to go home now

1211112113.body: Today was a tiring but a happy day! You feel your smile on your mouth all the way till you go home. Luckily the campus was safe, so you could go home alone at ease...

12111121133.title: Happy Ending!!!
12111121133.body: Ending: You are happier, though next time please pay attention to saftey!

1211111.body: You offend the professor as you completely fall off the table.You end up having to leave the room. (-20) (-20)

12111113.body: Although you offended the professor and was separated form your dormmates, you know tommorow will be a better day

121111133.title: Normal Ending
121111133.body:
Ending: Your studies are very important, next time please try not to does off in class
Hint: You can try to schedule your classes and everything, and think ahead of time. Please try to communicate ahead of time, as to make sure everything goes well.Although it may not have ended well this time, the people are still there, and you still have time to make amends with the professor.
Note: Your mental health and physical health are influenced by the amount of time you have and although flexibility is good, you need to see what is important to you.

122.body: Your roommates seem busy still so..

1221.body: You try to interupt your roommate but fail. You hear loud phone call in the middle of the night, you decide to..
1221.button2: Try to talk to your roommate

12213.body:
You quietly get out off your bed to tell the person off, but as you approach the restroom door of where the phone call is being made.
You hear a loud and upset yell. 'Why can't you be happy for me?' You heard, seeing as it sounded personal, you didn't wanted to be caught eavsdropping

122133.body: You ended up feeling bad and pretending to sleep!

1221333.body:
You ended up falling asleep for real. You wake up and your roomates are gone. You do feel a bit tired for sleeping late though (-20)
Class was now over. But there's a gathering after class, you decide to

12213332.title: Normal ending
12213332.body: Ending: You stay home like the introvert you are. You end up making friends with your introvert roommate. Though your other roommate never came back.

12213331.body: You went to the class gathering, you see your dormmate in the restroom crying... You decide to...

122133312.body:
You talk to other people, and decide to gove your dormmate space.
When you go back to the dorm, you realize your dormmate hasn't come back.
Later next morning, you found out your roommate had completely dropped out off school.
No one knows where they are now...

1221333123.title: Normal Ending
1221333123.body:
Ending: Regular College Life! You go to class as always, but sometimes you can't help thinking about that roommate, until one day you see them working as a bartender.
You greet them, and they just acted like they didn't know you. I guess life turns out unexpectedly.

122133311.body:
You talk to your dormmate and try to cheer them up as they are crying heavily.
Turns out your roommmate broke up with his lover that day, and when he called his parents they were upset about his art major...
You ended up carrying your drunken roommate home.

1221333113.title: Happy? Ending
1221333113.body:
Ending: You end up being very good friends with your dormmate.
With your help, your dormmate no longer had suicidal thoughts, and under your advice, he started going to therpay and counseling.
But they were not willing to go without you. The issue now is, your dormmate seems to have a fever when they see you...

1222.body:
You wake up with a headache, because last night you did not communicate with your roommates, they ended up setting alarm clocks that woke you up.
One of them alo had a phone call late at night (-40) (-40)

122233.body: You go to class with a headache, and nearly got ran over with a bus. (-20) (-40)

1222333.title: Bad Ending/Bad beginning of your life
1222333.body: Ending: Life was Tough! You ended up talking to your roommates about it and problem was solved. The next day you talked to the proffessor and checked to see if you missed anything.
